name: XCSourceTextPosition
desc: A zero-based position in a source editor, defined by a line number and column number.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new source text position at the beginning of the source text.

items.name: init(line: Int, column: Int)
items.desc: Creates a source text position at the specified line and column.

items.name: var column: Int
items.desc: The horizontal component of a source text position.

items.name: var line: Int
items.desc: The vertical component of a source text position.
